molecular.geometry.cos_angle¶

molecular.geometry.cos_angle(a, b, c=None)[source]¶

Compute cosine of the angle between three points \(\angle ABC\).

Parameters

  • a (ArrayLike) – Vectors

  • b (ArrayLike) – Vectors

  • c (ArrayLike) – Vectors

Returns

Cosine angle of points

Return type

float or numpy.ndarray
